resources.string: Brakes Service
Disc Pads Service
Cables and Housings Service
Cassette Service
Chain Service
Chain Ring Service
Rear Derailleur Service
Frame Bearings Service
Rear Hub Service
Disc Brakes Service
Dropper Post Service
Fork Service
Front Hub Service
Rear Suspension Service
Thru Axle Service
Tires Service
Tubeless Fluid Replacement
Wheels and Spokes Inspection
Tread Wear Inspection
Perform hydraulic circuit purging and piston maintenance for optimal brake performance.
Visually inspect disc pads for wear or damage. Replace if necessary to ensure efficient braking.
Visually inspect cable housings for wear or damage. Replace if necessary to maintain smooth gear shifting.
Check the wear of the cassette. Consider replacing if it shows excessive wear or hinders gear shifting.
Replace the chain to maintain precise gear changes and prevent excessive wear on other components.
Check the wear of the chain ring. Consider replacing if it shows excessive wear.
Clean and lubricate the rear derailleur mechanism for smooth and reliable shifting.
Check the condition and lubrication of the frame bearings. Replace if necessary to maintain frame integrity and smooth operation.
Check the condition and lubrication of the rear hub to ensure smooth rotation and reliable performance.
Check the wear of the disc brakes. Consider replacing if they are worn or deformed to ensure safe braking.
Check and lubricate the adjustable seatpost for smooth operation without play or lockout.
Check and maintain the fork according to the manufacturer\'s recommendations for optimal suspension performance.
Check the condition and lubrication of the front hub to ensure smooth rotation and reliable performance.
Check and maintain the rear suspension according to the manufacturer\'s recommendations for optimal performance and comfort.
Check the condition and proper tightening of the thru axle to ensure secure wheel attachment.
Check the tread wear of the tires. Consider replacing if they are worn to ensure optimal traction and safety.
Replace tubeless fluid every 1000 km for effective sealing and prevention of punctures.
Inspect the condition of wheels and spokes every 1000 km. Ensure they are properly tensioned and free from visible damage to maintain wheel integrity.
Inspect the tread wear of the tires every 4000 km. Consider replacing if they are worn to ensure optimal performance.
